Description: On I-64 at mile marker 279.8 in the City of Norfolk, near Norview Avenue, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The east right shoulder is closed.

Description: On I-64 in the City of Hampton, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel East, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage. All east lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage

Description: On I-495 at mile marker 46.6 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The south right shoulder is closed.
